[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@mahadao/arth-ethers](./arth-ethers.md) &gt; [EthersARTHConnectionOptionalParams](./arth-ethers.ethersarthconnectionoptionalparams.md) &gt; [userAddress](./arth-ethers.ethersarthconnectionoptionalparams.useraddress.md)

## EthersARTHConnectionOptionalParams.userAddress property

Address whose Trove, Stability Deposit, MAHA Stake and balances will be read by default.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
readonly userAddress?: string;
```

## Remarks

For example [getTrove(address?)](./arth-ethers.ethersarth.gettrove.md) will return the Trove owned by `userAddress` when the `address` parameter is omitted.

Should be omitted when connecting through a [Signer](./arth-ethers.etherssigner.md)<!-- -->. Instead `userAddress` will be automatically determined from the `Signer`<!-- -->.
